How to Begin

How to work through these tutorials – How should a new coder approach these tutorials?
Save your progress - soft intro to git – This is an introduction on saving your code the way a developer does – through source control management. git is what is used for these tutorials.
Setting up your computer – All the needed dependencies for setting up your Mac, Linux, or Windows machine for these tutorials.
